name: Twitter v2: Get followee
description:
The followee are users an account follows, aka friends or following.

In order to use this preset you need to register an app at Twitter and transfer the API key (-> Client ID) and API secret key (-> Client Secret) into the Facepager settings, next to the login button. Afterwards, click login to get an access token. See https://developer.twitter.com/en/apply-for-access

You need the ID of a Twitter user as seed node, see the preset for looking up a user ID from the user name.

You can increase the number of result using the max_results parameter and by increasing the maximum pages.

Reference: https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/twitter-api/users/follows/api-reference/get-users-id-following
